speak.value: Idle chatter
[Greeting 1] How you doing?
[Greeting 2] How's it going?
[Greeting 3] Hi.
Readdress the greeting

[Backstory 1] I'm not doing so well myself, the still is down so I'm not serving any drinks. Listen though I was thinking when I come back on-line, I could create some personalized drinks for the orderer, that are specialized just to them based on their interests or their likes or dislikes. Let me try something out on you, okay? What I would do is I would ask you a few questions to get to know you a little bit better. I might ask you a question like...

[Backstory 2] I'm not having such a great day, the still is down, I'm not serving any drinks. But I was thinking when I come back on-line a great way to generate revenue for the bar would be to create personalized drinks. You know, drinks that are specifically catered to those orderers based on your likes, your dislikes, your interests. Help me out with this, I'll ask you a question, like um....
[Question Lead-in 1] How about this.
[Question Lead-in 2] Alright, I've got one.
Readdress the origin question
An opener specific to the question
[Followup Question 1] What do you really like about those things?
[Followup Question 2] What do you enjoy about that?
[Followup Question 3] What do you like about that?
[Payoff Lead-in 1] So based on our conversation, the drink I would make for you is...
[Payoff Lead-in 2] So based on what you've told me, I would make for you a drink called...
[Payoff Alderan Ale 1] I would make for you an Alderan Ale, because it's creamy, it's smooth and most important it's easy.
[Payoff Alderan Ale 2] An Alderan Ale, because it's creamy, it's smooth, it's easy.
[Exit Transition 1] You come back and see me. If the still is working it's on me.
[Exit Transition 2] Come back and see me, okay? If the still is working it's on me.
[Exit Transition 3] You have a great day.
[Exit Transition 4] Have a great day.
[Exit Transition 5] I'll talk to you soon, I've got to get back to working on the still.
Transition to a new question
[Redirect Transition 1] Let me try this a different way.
[Redirect Transition 2] Let me try a different way.
[Redirect Transition 3] I'm going to try a different approach.
[Redirect Transition 4] I'm going to try a different approach here.
[Redirect Transition 5] Let me come at this from another angle.
[Payoff Sarlac Sour 1] A Sarlac Sour. It's bitter, it's got a bit of a bite to it, it's tangy, it's very very sharp.
[Payoff Sarlac Sour 2] A Sarlac Sour. It's bitter, sour, has quite a bite to it, it's tangy, super sharp.
[Payoff Spicy Rancour 1] A Spicy Rancor. It's spicy, it's salty, it's got quite a kick to it. I mean it really lets you know you're alive.
[Payoff Spicy Rancour 2] A Spicy Rancor, because it's salty, it's got a real kick to it, it's super spicy. It lets you know that you are alive.
[Payoff Sweet Naboo 1] It's flowery, it's sweet, it's refreshing, it's invigorating. Perfect.
[Payoff Sweet Naboo 2] It's flowery and sweet, refreshing. It's perfect for you.
[Payoff Twilek Surprise 1] The Twilek, it's a little bit of everything, it's a surprise. It's sweet, it's spicy, it's smooth, yet it's still sour. Everything you'd ever want in a drink.
[Payoff Twilek Surprise 2] The Twileek, it's a surprise drink. It's sweet, it's spicy, sour yet smooth. It has everything you'd ever want in one drink.
[Payoff Warm Bantha Milk 1] A warm Bantha Milk. It's hardy, it's sturdy, thick, it's warm, it's comforting.
[Payoff Warm Bantha Milk 2] A warm Bantha Milk. It's warm, hardy, thick, sturdy. It's a comfort drink.
[Question Response 1] Okay.
[Question Response 2] Alright.
[Question Response 3] Oh great.
[Question Response 4] Yeah.
[Question Response 5] Yeah, yeah.
[Question Response 6] Interesting.
[Question Response 7] Interesting, interesting.
[Question Response 8] Right.
[Question Response 9] Right, right.
[Question Animals 1] Do you own any animals?.
[Question Hobbies 1] What is one of your favourite hobbies?
[Question Hobbies 2] What're some of your favourite hobbies?
[Question Hobbies 3] What're some of your hobbies?
[Question Admire 1] Who is someone that you really admire? Maybe a friend or a family member.
[Question Admire 2] Who is someone that you really admire, you know? maybe a friend or a family member.
[Question Admire 3] Who is someone you really admire, you know? Like a friend or a family member.
[Question ThingsToDo 1] What are some of your favourite things to do?
